attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you think that the PM should do more about our troops over iraq and who fighting the war on terror? Also the terrorist who attact public place & building Should get LIFE in a high Security and never come out. for example the 21/07 bomber only got minimum of 40 YEARS in PRISON.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
